snippet.title: Drill Core - Announcement Trailer | tinyBuild Connect 2024
snippet.description:
⚠️ JOIN THE PLAYTEST: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2821800/Drill_Core/

Welcome to Drill Core, where corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

Follow Drill Core:
https://discord.gg/N67zjtTjgw
https://twitter.com/DrillCoreGame
